connect20/exclusiveconcepts2_conversions.name: connect20/Exclusiveconcepts2_Conversionsondemand

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/exclusiveconcepts2_conversions.description: Conversions On Demand is designed to prevent shoppers from leaving your site before making a purchase. Years of testing and data analysis power each application we make available through Conversions On Demand. The Conversions On Demand Suite includes a The Daily Deal Bar, The Cart Closer, Time2Buy, Cart Reminder, and Email Booster. All 5 are available separately or in combination to improve your store's conversion rate.
